description: Computes backscatter from georeferenced SAR input.

parameters.description: Input data cube containing raw backscatter input. Note that backscatter computation may require instrument specific metadata that is tightly coupled to the original SAR products. As a result, this process may only work in combination with loading data from specific collections, not with general datacubes.
parameters.name: data

parameters.description: The backscatter coefficient to compute. Possible values: sigma0, gamma0.
parameters.name: backscatter_coefficient

parameters.description:
Enables/disables orthorectification. true: Orthorectified, false: non-Orthorectified.
 The non-orthorectified products use a simple earth model as provided in the products themselves. This may be sufficient for very flat target areas and is faster to process.
parameters.name: orthorectify

parameters.description: The (collection) name of the digital elevation model to use, leave empty to allow the backend to make a suitable choice. Not all backends may offer all digital elevation models. Elevation models are listed as collections, or can be found in backend specific documentation.
parameters.name: elevation_model

returns.description: Backscatter values in linear power corresponding to the chosen backscatter coefficient. For decibel values, an additional conversion is needed.

UnsupportedParameter.message: One of the provided parameters is not supported by this backend. This can be resolved by using default parameters, or using a backend that supports the parameter value.
